dcterms:creator: Andrew Kachites McCallum
Kamal Nigam
Jason Rennie
Kristie Seymore
dcterms:description: Cora is a citation network dataset where nodes represent articles and edges denote citations between articles. Each article is described by bag-of-words feature vectors.
dcterms:title: Cora

dcterms:creator: Andrew Kachites McCallum
Kamal Nigam
Jason Rennie
Kristie Seymore
dcterms:description: Cora_ml is a variant of the Cora dataset, also representing a citation network with articles and citations, described by bag-of-words feature vectors.
dcterms:title: Cora_ml

dcterms:creator: C Lee Giles
Kurt D Bollacker
Steve Lawrence
dcterms:description: CiteSeer is an automatic citation indexing system that provides a dataset of scientific literature with citation relationships.
dcterms:title: CiteSeer

dcterms:creator: C Lee Giles
Kurt D Bollacker
Steve Lawrence
dcterms:description: CiteSeer_full is a comprehensive version of the CiteSeer dataset, containing a broader range of scientific literature and citation relationships.
dcterms:title: CiteSeer_full

dcterms:creator: Julian McAuley
Christopher Targett
Qinfeng Shi
Anton Van Den Hengel
dcterms:description: Amazon_cs is a dataset representing co-purchase relationships among products on Amazon, where nodes are products and edges denote co-purchases.
dcterms:title: Amazon_cs

dcterms:creator: Julian McAuley
Christopher Targett
Qinfeng Shi
Anton Van Den Hengel
dcterms:description: Amazon_photo is a dataset of co-purchase relationships among photo-related products on Amazon, where nodes are products and edges denote co-purchases.
dcterms:title: Amazon_photo
